result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shaun Nieves

attys.name: De Los Santos, Gerardo Antonio, Jr

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos Jr in court for Shaun Nieves. Defendant Shaun Nieves appeared by video, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke. This matter is set for trial.
Jury status hearing scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Jury selection scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 08:30 am.

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos Jr in court for Shaun Nieves. Defendant Shaun Nieves appeared by video, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney De Los Santos advises that the DE have a revocation hearing and would like to set this after that.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.

NO RECORD MADE.  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared by zoom w/ Attorney De Los Santos.  Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney De Los Santos states he is waiting on some video discovery. STC set to 10/14/22 at 10:30.

State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos in court with Defendant Shaun Nieves who appears in custody.  Clerk: PU
  Minutes:    Sworn in and testified is State's witness:  KPD Det. J. Kunz; cross-examination by Atty De Los Santos. State rests and moves for bind over; arguments heard. Probable cause found; bound over for trial. Information filed; reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Scheduling Order mailed to Attorney.   Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.
State's Response to Exclude Witnesses Lacking Personal Knowledge

08:43 AM Defendant Shaun Nieves appeared with Attorney Gerardo Antonio De Los Santos.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Brendaliz Valdes appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Atty De Los Santos has filed a motion on 07-27 to exclude witnesses.  State did not have 5 day notice of motion.    DE waives time for preliminary hearing to allow State to respond to motion.  Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.
